page.description: Move to a different control - directions are 'next' and 'prev'.

argument.name: title
argument.description: The title of the dialog box.

argument.name: direction
argument.description:
The direction in which to move the cursor. "next" = the next control
"prev" = the previous control

page.discussion: The UI_DLG_NAVIGATE() function moves the cursor and focus to the next or previous control on the Xdialog form.
